components.description: Bio Tuned Ergonomic Components dual density anatomical design
700C x 38 smooth rolling all weather tread
Pro Max alloy linear pull with linear spring & Multi-Condition pads.
Alloy Adjustable, 55 degree movement with 180mm quill insertion and removable cap
Comfort Tuned Super Soft Plus with memory foam and special waterproof stretch cover
Alloy suspension with micro adjust head, pre-load adjust with 35mm travel 27.2 x 330mm
Planet Bike rear alloy carrier, front and rear full wrap fenders, alloy kick stand and handles bar mounted bell
